comments.body:
We need this for 2 purposes.
1. Purging merged recipes. ( xref: https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/1467 )
2. To error out PR builds that have merge conflicts.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +4,8 @@# Add `master` branch to the update list.
# Otherwise CircleCI will give us a cached one.
FETCH_REFS="+master:master"

# Update PR refs for testing.

comments.body: Since we always have at least one ref to retrieve this does not need an `if` block to protect it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@
# Retrieve the refs.
git fetch -u origin ${FETCH_REFS}

# Checkout the PR merge ref.

comments.body: As we know what we are merging into, we can check for this conflict. However, we can't do this more generally in `conda-smithy` as we don't know generally what branch we are merging into as we don't have the needed [info](https://discuss.circleci.com/t/add-environment-varible-circle-pr-base-branch/6189).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +25,29 @@if [[ -n "${CIRCLE_PR_NUMBER}" ]]
then
    git branch --merged | grep master > /dev/null
    git branch --merged | grep "pr/${CIRCLE_PR_NUMBER}/head" > /dev/null
fi
